title: MAX2

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **MAX.(period)** — At night, choose a player. That player will permanently gain access to 1 ability from a role they had in another game, randomly selected by the host. Additionally, for the rest of the game, they may perform double the amount of actions that they would ordinarily be able to during any phase.
- **MAX 300 (Super-Max-Me Mix)** — At night, choose a player. That player will gain infinite uses of all limited-use abilities they have, and may use abilities during any phase for the rest of the game.
- **MAX 360** — You may use this ability at any time, even while dead. All dead players are instantly revived, and for the rest of the game, players may use abilities while dead. Your Goal changes to: `Ensure that at least 360 abilities have been used before the game ends.` (1 use. If this ability has been used once already, it may not be used a second time even if there are additional uses remaining.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may self-target.
- You always know how many abilities have been used during the course of the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that at least 300 abilities have been used before the game ends.
